io.gearpump.streaming.task

Interface TaskInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSinkTask, DataSourceTask, OpTranslator.GroupByTask, OpTranslator.SinkTask, OpTranslator.SourceTask, OpTranslator.TransformTask, PersistentTask, Task, Task, TaskWrapper

    public interface TaskInterface
    Streaming Task interface

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart(StartTime startTime)
        Method called with the task is initialized.
        Parameters:
        startTime - startTime that can be used to decide from when a source producer task should replay the data source, or from when a processor task should recover its checkpoint data in to in-memory state.

      • onNext

        void onNext(io.gearpump.Message msg)
        Method called for each message received.
        Parameters:
        msg - message send by upstream tasks

      • onStop

        void onStop()
        Method called when task is under clean up. This can be used to cleanup resource when the application finished.

      • receiveUnManagedMessage

        scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> receiveUnManagedMessage()
        handler for unmanaged message
        Returns:
        the handler
